data.title: St Mary's Bryanston Square CofE School
data.meta_description: St Mary's Bryanston Square CofE School
data.text:
Welcome to our Governors’ section.

Please find below details of how our Governing body is structured, including the names, categories, responsibilities and terms of appointment for each Governor.

St Mary’s School Governors

St Mary’s has a board of 12 Governors, who are responsible for leading the school and making decisions about how the school is run.

You can contact the Governors via the Clerk, Veronica Haidar: clerk@stmbs.org.uk

For further information about Governance at St Mary’s Bryanston Square – please see Get Information About Schools.

You can contact the school Governors via the Clerk, Veronica Haidar: clerk@stmbs.org.uk

The Governors are:

Sarah Bedford
